translation.offerLocalized: Your browser prefers «{{lngName}}», but you use «{{lngName2}}» version. Would you like to switch to «{{lngName}}»?

toasts.mutedIOS: Your device is muted. See the mechanical switch on the left side of your iPhone.

nativeAssistanceOption: Explain new things in native language

top.heroSubhead:
Get past the intermediate plateau through speaking
practice with AI, instant corrections, and daily articles.
top.wdywts: Which language do you want to speak?

route: Chat about any topic you’re interested in and choose between tutors of different dialects.
Click on any word to learn its meaning and pronunciation or add it to your dictionary.
Test your understanding by answering questions about what you’ve read. Your AI tutor can discuss the article with you.

mobile.header1:
The latest AI tech,
optimized for languages

explain: Immerse in real-life scenarios to make your practice sessions relevant and practical.
Get clear, step-by-step guidance and corrections to help you progress confidently.
Lingolette adjusts to your level, interests and pace for a fully personalized experience.

if.header: Lingolette is perfect for you if...

schools.body:
We support schools and educational
institutions with language learning solutions.

news.header: Subscribe for offers, updates and news

community.header:
Join a community of
learners reaching fluency

sources.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{sourceName}}?
sources.unsubscribeConfirm: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from {{sourceName}}?
sources.maxSources: It is not effective to follow more than 5 topics at a time. Please unsubscribe from some topics to add new ones.

streak.subHeader: Build your streak by doing article tasks or talking to your tutor.

chat.tutorDescr: Practice talking to your tutor on a given topic

call.subHeader: Have a voice only conversation with Letty. Perfect for building confidence and fluency!
call.buttonSubtitle: Try your first AI voice call
call.limitReached: Calls are limited to {{maxMinutes}} minutes on your tier.

article.disclaimer: All content and tasks are generated by AI inspired by a real publication.

p:
We have a category of content generated for free for everyone with default settings (B1 language level, no custom vocabulary, news image style, standard voices).
        You are welcome to use it for free forever, but if you want to customize it, you will need to create a free or paid account, depending on the level of customization you need.
The free content is generated automatically every day, so it is always up to date.

inquiry.subHeader: Leave us some contact details and we will get back to you
inquiry.subHeader2: We will get back to you within one business day.
inquiry.plhMessage: Anything else we need to know?

login.hintSignUp:
Create an account
to start learning
login.disclaimer: By proceeding, you agree to our terms and privacy policy.
login.receiveOffers: receive special offers from our partners
login.badEmailProvider: Please use an email that is not a one-time address.
login.alreadyRegistered: You are already registered with another provider (Google, Linkedin, Microsoft or Apple).
login.codeExpired: The code has expired. Please try again.
login.codeNotFound: Code not found. This often happens when people request two codes at the same time and then try to use the code from the first request. Please try again.
login.checkMailbox: Check your mailbox for a code and enter or paste it below
login.tryEmailLogin: Login failed: {{MSG}}. Try to log in with an email instead.
login.userDeleted: You have deleted this user. Please wait 7 days until we remove all your data according to the law or contact us if you want to restore your account.

paymentDone.confirmation: Thank you! A confirmation email will be sent to {{email}}.

progressPlot.subHeader: Based on real Lingolette user data

lettyChat.bblHello: Hello! You’ve come to the right place to improve your speaking!
lettyChat.bblName: First things first, what’s your name?
selLevel: I can talk about most topics
I can talk about almost all topics
lettyChat.bblLngComment: That’s excellent. We will pick up where you left off.
lettyChat.bblWhy: So, it’s {{LNG}}. Why are you learning it?
selGoal: To communicate with family or friends
bblGoalComment: Travel is a great reason to learn a language. You will be able to talk to locals and make new friends.
Learning a language for work is a great way to advance your career.
Language learning is a great hobby.
Learning a language for family or friends is a great way to connect with them.
lettyChat.bblHowMuchTime: How much time are you able to commit to learning?
lettyChat.bblPrefs: By the way, you can change your preferences in the settings later. 🙂
lettyChat.bblIfYou: {{NAME}}, based on our data, if you practice just for {{TPD}} minutes a day on Lingolette...
lettyChat.bblThenYou: ... then your vocabulary will grow by {{GROWTH}} words in just 30 days!
lettyChat.bblReadyToMeet: So, are you ready to get started?

findingTeacher.youWillLearn: With {{TPD}} minutes a day talking to me, you’ll learn {{GROWTH}} new words a month.
findingTeacher.drawerHeader: You’re on your way to fluency.
findingTeacher.drawFace: Draw a happy face to lock it in.

feed.emptyText: You’re not following any topics yet.
feed.emptyText2: Find topics to get started. If you have just subscribed, new articles may appear with a delay.
feed.chatOnlyText: We only support talking to the AI teacher in {{LNG}} language. To read articles, switch to another language.

account.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
account.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to DELETE your account? There is no way back! If you have a subscription, it will disappear without a refund.
account.deleteConfirmation: It’s sad to see you go. Your data will be deleted within next 7 days.
account.topicsDetails: These define the articles in your feed. Choose up to 5.
account.whenApplied: Settings will be applied to a new chat
account.hideCardDetails: Others can see your public profile

account.hideCompletedExercisesDetails: Articles with completed exercises will be hidden in the feed

vocabulary.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this word?
vocabulary.intensiveToast: Intensive learning is on. The AI teacher will now focus on this word more during the lessons.

talk.confirmDrop: We found a previous unrelated discussion. Shall we drop it?
talk.phInputDesktop: Type here or hold spacebar to speak
talk.longChatWarning: The chat is getting too long. Restart it to get a better experience.
talk.listenFailed: We could not recognize your voice. Possible reasons: being silent, murmuring, loud background noises, muted device, microphone settings.
talk.sseFailed: Hmm... Connection to server was lost. If it’s temporarily, try to reload the page.
talk.longVoiceInput: Keep your replies below 30 seconds to get the best experience.

teacher.confirmChange: Changing the teacher will restart the chat. Are you sure?

talk.situationsHeader: Choose a situation and complete the goal by talking.

lngMismatch.text: Your chat language is '{{CHAT_LNG}}' while you are learning '{{TARGET_LNG}}'. Restart the chat to align them or change your language back.

suggestions.inputHint: Or type own reply in your native language

talk.noteBasicModel: This is a basic AI-model. Upgrade to Premium to get more features!

call.contextHack: Ready for a speaking practice session? Letty is excited to chat with you! Just speak naturally when you're ready.
call.transcriptHint: ✨ Tap any word to learn more about it
call.statusWelcome: Get ready for an amazing conversation!

tools.title: Power up your learning!
scratchpad: work with any text using Lingolette
extensions: access Lingolette’s Scratchpad from any site
wordsGame: play a game of words pronunciation
flashcards: repeat your vocabulary words until you learn them

userCard.streakInfo: Your streak is the number of consecutive days you’ve been learning with Lingolette. Keep it up!
userCard.gemsInfo: Gems are a virtual currency you can use to buy premium features and content. You earn gems by completing tasks.
userCard.energyInfo: Energy is used to talk to AI teacher, read articles, and to do other activities.

upgrade.activeSubPresent: You already have an active subscription.

feedback.bodyStart: We’re always looking to improve. Please share feedback, bug reports or feature requests here. We read all the messages!
feedback.bodyEnd: Your feedback has been submitted. We appreciate it!

You're on the web version — nice!
But Lingolette works way better as a native app.

mediaError.errNotAllowed: Cannot acquire permissions from your browser. Please ensure that they are not blocked.
mediaError.errAbort: Camera access is blocked. Please ensure that you are not using it in another browser or program.
mediaError.errFallback: You provided access to your hardware devices, but a local problem in your system prevented your device from being used. Please try another browser or another device.
mediaError.retryError: Nope, it didn’t work. Check your hardware settings.

Beat the heat but you can’t beat the price!

share.subheader: Tell your friends about your progress in learning languages!

pledge.offer: I, {{NAME}}, pledge to dedicate at least 10 minutes every day to practicing {{LANG}}.
pledge.accepted:
You have joined the Daily Practice Pledge!

Every day, spend just 10 minutes practicing {{LANG}} and watch your fluency leap.

promptCash.trialInfo: Due to crypto currency limitations we can’t offer free trials and automatic subscriptions. You will have to pay again manually in a year.
promptCash.lagInfo: Please note that the payment may take a few minutes to process.

preReview.text: We want you to have the best experience! Rate and review us so we can improve.

step1.header: Letty is sorry to see you go!
step1.description: We're always looking to become better. Please tell us why you're cancelling so we can improve. We promise we read all feedback!

step2.header: Cancelling means that you'll lose your premium benefits:
step2.disclaimer: By cancelling, Premium access will be gone. Payment for the rest of the period will not be refunded.

repeat.intro: You will see cards with words. Each word will be spoken out loud. After that you will have 3 seconds to repeat it. Click a card to go to a new one.

testSpeaker.cannotPlay: Could not play the sound. Please check your audio settings.

info: Oops, our linguistic explorers are on a thrilling quest for articles in a language yet to be unveiled. It seems they’re still packing their dictionaries and setting up grammar traps!

Fear not, dear polyglot-in-waiting! While we’re decoding the secrets of this intriguing tongue, why not flex those linguistic muscles with our existing languages? Dust off your French, stretch your Spanish, and polish your Klingon (just kidding, we don’t have Klingon... yet).
noArticles.ctaHint: Because who needs articles when you can conquer the world with words!

contextTools.logInForContext: Log in to get translations, context tools, pronunciation and more.

articleView.logInForAssessment: Log in to get your answers assessed by AI.
articleView.readingSubhead: Read this text and listen to it at the same time. If you don’t know a word click it to see explanation, hear pronunciation or add it to vocabulary.
articleView.questionsSubhead: Answer the questions to the text. Speak or write, you choose. AI will assess your answers.
articleView.imDeSubhead: Look at the article image and describe what you see on it. You may either speak or write your answer there.
articleView.discussP: Discuss this article with your AI tutor to practice. Your tutor will help you with vocabulary and grammar.
articleView.logInForDiscussion: Log in to start the conversation with AI.
articleView.printedInfo:
Read a new article every day and
discuss it with AI at lingolette.com
articleView.answerToSeeAnswer: Give your answer first to reveal the correct one

speakTextInput.hint: Type or hold mic icon to speak

cards: You want to improve spoken and written fluency
You need a practice buddy that adapts to your pace and taste instead of static curriculum.
You want to grow your vocabulary
Using the same words and phrases repetitively? Lingolette adds variety to your language learning.
You don’t have the budget for a language school.
Language schools are expensive. Lingolette is affordable and available all the time!
You struggle with finding opportunities to practice.
Real-world language practice is often hard to come by unless you’re in a country where the language is spoken.
You get nervous while speaking a foreign language
No judgement here! We all get nervous sometimes. Lingolette will help you grow in confidence.
You need flexible practice that fits into your schedule.
You don’t always have hours to sit in a class. Some days, 15 minutes is all you can give.

tutor.name: Tutor {{NAME}}
tutor.header: Unlock unlimited chats with me on Premium!
tutor.subHeader: You will also get smarter tutor replies, free articles and extra language tools.
tutor.subHeaderEN: You will also get pronunciation corrections, free articles and extra language tools.

premiumOffer.legalShit: Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.

gemCave.explanation: Click the button, watch a video ad, earn a gem! It's as simple as that.
gemCave.notSupported: Earning gems is currently supported only in our iOS and Android apps.

joinCommunity.body: Join our Discord to practice languages, request features and get exclusive updates!
